children.name: enableDarkness
children.title: Dark
children.tooltip: Enable this to turn this section into a dark section (supported only at OpenGL feature level 3 and higher).

children.name: ambient
children.title: Ambient Light
children.tooltip: The color of the darkness, when no light is present.

children.name: shadowType
children.title: Shadow Type
children.tooltip: Which type of shadow casting to use (please note that ray shadows are very resource intensive, and may cause lag).

children.name: shadowStrength
children.title: Shadow Strength
children.tooltip: How soft shadows should be (softer drop shadows are more resource intensive).

children.name: fgParticles
children.title: Foreground Particles
children.tooltip: Name of the particle system to draw above the section and below the HUD (supported only at OpenGL feature level 2 and higher).

children.name: bgParticles
children.title: Background Particles
children.tooltip: Name of the particle system to draw above the background and below the section objects (supported only at OpenGL feature level 2 and higher).

children.name: screenEffect
children.title: Screen Effect
children.tooltip: Name of the screen effect to draw above the section and below the HUD (supported only at OpenGL feature level 2 and higher).
